text: Keith Alan Olsen (May 12, 1945 - March 9, 2020) was an American record producer and sound engineer. Olsen was born in Sioux Falls, South Dakota. He worked with Rick Springfield; Fleetwood Mac; Ozzy Osbourne; the Grateful Dead; Whitesnake; Pat Benatar; Heart; Santana; Saga; Foreigner; Scorpions; Magnum; Journey; Emerson, Lake & Palmer; Joe Walsh; and Eric Burdon & the Animals, among others. Olsen died on March 9, 2020 in Genoa, Nevada of cardiac arrest, aged 74.} ==References== Category:1945 births Category:2020 deaths Category:American audio engineers Category:American record producers Category:Musicians from South Dakota Category:People from Sioux Falls, South Dakota
title: Keith Olsen
